name: M.A.G.Gi
description:
Description

M.A.G.Gi is a 3D puzzle platformer focused on a cute robot that uses three rocket boosters to navigate complex levels. Guide M.A.G.Gi through meaningful levels, meet and assist a diverse roster of characters, and discover unique and entertaining movement combos as you help M.A.G.Gi save the universe.

Controls Mouse & KeyboardGamePadMoveWASDLeft StickMove CameraMouseRight StickJumpSpacebarSouth ButtonDashRight Click / Left ShiftEast ButtonShootLeft ClickRight TriggerAimELeft TriggerGround Pound /
InteractQWest ButtonPauseEscStart
